title: Icatian Moneychanger
text: Icatian Moneychanger enters the battlefield with three credit counters on it.When Icatian Moneychanger enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to you.At the beginning of your upkeep, put a credit counter on Icatian Moneychanger.Sacrifice Icatian Moneychanger: You gain 1 life for each credit counter on Icatian Moneychanger. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
